Author: strawberryrhubarbjam
Text: I struggle with BED too and it sucks. I’ve often thought of using SH more often to get through the times I want to binge. For me it’s because I use both as a coping skill and a source of comfort I think. Even though the comfort I get from them is short lived. I’m trying to find healthier things to do instead..Coloring is great because you can do it for hours and it takes a good amount of focus.
